wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Warwick (1918-2009) was a British author, prisoner of war and survivor of the Burma to Siam death railway.

response: The portrait of Ernest Warwick is another example of the 1000 or so portraits Old is reported to have painted, although only 18 are known to have survived.https://www.captivememories.org.uk/sites/fepow/files/upload/Two%20Portraits%20of%20Charlie%20Proctor.pdf

*Ernest Warwick (1918–2009), British author and prisoner of war
